title: Whose Tracks Are These?
description: In Whose Tracks Are These? students learn to use facts and photographs of animal tracks to guess which animals have visited a place. This book includes a table of contents as well as a glossary to support students as they read.
meta: antlers, claws, curved, footprints, hooves, shed
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
R-Controlled Vowels : Identify r-controlled ar letter combination
Commas : Recognize and use commas in a series
High-Frequency Words : Recognize, read, and write high-frequency words who and whose

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
